ComicInfo.Summary:
In Demonslayer: Prophecy #1 Jaclyn learned that one of those closest to her was destined to bring about the collapse of civilization. She didn't believe it. This special issue is a flash forward twenty years in the future as the horrific Prophecy has come true. Jaclyn has been betrayed and as a result Hell's demonic armies have invaded Earth. Now the last living Demonslayer must stand as a beacon of hope for all of humanity. This special one-shot book gives readers a special advance look at the future of Demonslayer, and it isn't a pretty vision.
